Row.Text: Only the Byzantines may build this unit. The Dromon is more expensive to build than the Trireme it replaces, but it attacks with lethal Greek Fire, making it the first naval unit with a ranged attack. This unit fights at +50% strength against other naval units and earns [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each unit they kill. Dromons advance your religious goals while protecting your coastal territory from barbarians, and they can also be used for early rushes against weakly defended coastal cities. It cannot enter Deep Ocean tiles outside of the city borders.
